Date220

public Date220(int month,
               int day,
               int year)
        throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Construct a date from three numeric components.

Parameters:
month - The month of the year. 1 = Jan, 2 = Feb, etc.
day - The day of the month. Must be in the correct range for that month
year - The (4-digit) year
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if given an improper month or day number

Date220

public Date220(java.lang.String mName,
               int day,
               int year)
        throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Construct a date from month name, day, and year

Parameters:
mName - Name of month. Must be one of the strings from monthName.
day - Day of month. Same constarints as other constructor
year - 4-didig year number
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if mName is not a valid month name or day is not legal for given month and year
